00010 #ifndef _VECTOR3_H_
00011 #define _VECTOR3_H_
00012 #include "VectorBase.h"
00013 
00014 template<>
00015 class Vector<3> : public VectorBase<Vector<3>, 3> {
00016 public:
00017     union {
00018         Real array[3];
00019         struct { Real x, y, z; };
00020         struct { Real s, t, u; };
00021         struct { Real i, j, k; };
00022         struct { Real r, g, b; };
00023     };
00024 
00025     Vector(): VectorBase<Vector<3>, 3>() {}
00026     Vector(const Real *v): VectorBase<Vector<3>, 3>(v) {}
00027     Vector(const Vector<3> &v): VectorBase<Vector<3>, 3>(v) {}
00028     Vector(const Real &a, const Real &b, const Real &c): x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
00029 
00030     Real& operator[](int index) { return array[index]; }
00031     const Real& operator[](int index) const { return array[index]; }
00032     Vector<3>& crossProduct(const Vector<3> &rhs, Vector<3> &result) const {
00033         result[0] = array[1] * rhs[2] - array[2] * rhs[1];
00034         result[1] = array[2] * rhs[0] - array[0] * rhs[2];
00035         result[2] = array[0] * rhs[1] - array[1] * rhs[0];
00036         return result;
00037     }
00038 
00039     Vector<3> crossProduct(const Vector<3> &rhs) const {
00040         Vector<3> result;
00041         return crossProduct(rhs, result);
00042     }
00043 };
00044 
00045 typedef Vector<3> Vector3;
00046 typedef Vector<3> RGBf;
00047 
00048 #endif
